API.Comments: Returns the cipher suite in use by the session which was produced by the handshake.
Returns the certificate(s) that were sent to the peer during handshaking.
Returns the principal that was sent to the peer during handshaking.
Deprecated.The getPeerCertificates() method that returns an               array of java.security.cert.Certificate should               be used instead.
Returns the identity of the peer which was established as part of defining the session.
Returns the identity of the peer which was established as part of defining the session.
Returns the session that triggered this event.
